effects_structured.raw: Support quest and ward charge behavior.
Place a ward and grant vision.
When spotted by enemy [[Stealth#Stealthed_traps_and_wards stealthed]] {{tip wards}} or {{tip stealthed trap traps}}, gain ''Blackout'' for 8 seconds.
You {{tip disabled ward disable}} surrounding stealthed wards, as well as {{tip expose}} and {{tip true sight reveal}} nearby stealthed wards and traps while ''Blackout'' is active
Your [[basic attack]]s deal {{as {{rd 2 1}} '''bonus''' true damage}} to wards.

After being not {{tip sight visible}} to enemies for at least 1 second, your next basic attack against a champion is empowered to deal {{as 50 {{as (+ {{fd 1.5}} per 1 Lethality)}} '''bonus''' true damage}} [[on-hit]]
The empowered attack lasts for 4 seconds after being seen by an enemy.
